page.title: 03Two Schools in Oxford
page.content: Pupils at the Dragon private school start at the age of 7,then go on to the main school aged 8-13.Here they have boarders.They move up blocks(years) at Christmas.They have longer main holidays than us(St.Gregory's).They have school on Saturday mornings but having Wednesday afternoons off.We just have the weekends off.St.Gregory's caters for pupils aged 9-13,and is only for day pupils.We move up classes in September.The Dragon has its own hymn book & magazine,St.Gregory's has neither.They have more sports facilities including a rifle range, squash court,swimming pool & boathouse. We have sports lessons but the Dragon has its sport during their two hour lunch break. There is a long waiting list for the Dragon school.
